wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Hurdsfield (born 19 March 1876, date of death unknown) was a British athlete.  He competed at the 1908 Summer Olympics in London. He was born in Knutsford.In the 200 metres, Hurdsfield won his preliminary heat with a time of 23.6 seconds to advance to the semifinals.  There, he finished fourth and last in his heat to be eliminated without advancing to the final.
